channel.title: Need alot of help please some nice people help!
channel.description:
i need help how do i: -add monsters to my server -create commands e.g teles -and also how do i make monsters drop stuff
please help i will be very greatfull ad106

item.title: Need alot of help please some nice people help!
item.dc:creator: @Bettencourtt Bettencourtt
item.description:
@Bettencourtt wrote:

Hey adding teleport commands is easy

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3491; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }

just change the command name and coordinates Credits mod allstar for command

Read full topic
item.source: Need alot of help please some nice people help!

item.title: Need alot of help please some nice people help!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

googlethis:

WRONG SECTION! Also, you need to add it into your server’s code.

You have to be kidding me… how is this the wrong section…

Adding monsters is easy, just go into your autospawn and add the monster id, the name and all of the other stuff in the format that the other stuff is in.

spawn = 941	2728	9440	0	0	0	0	0	1	green dragon

The numbers after spawn = is the monster id number. the next is the X and Y coordinates. The 0’s are the range of the monster, and the 1 is the walk type. Since your a beginner, you should probably stick with the first 3 sets of numbers, the id, and coordinates.

Uhmmm the other stuff, ill try to look for a tutorial for you, because im not taking 15 minutes to make a tutorial in this post lol ;]

Read full topic
